Reviews.Title: Shambles..
Reviews.Author: sillysaz6 "Sarah"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone in Feb 09, put on a 2 year contract and now severely regretting it.. After about 4 months, the screen fuzzed over, and every time i used the lock button, the screen was all jazzy and unreadable. I sent it off to be repaired and got it back in one piece. Then one night I put the phone on my bedside table, and withn an hour, had conked out randomly. After taking it to be fixed, they said that it was waterlogged and couldnt be fixed, even though no liquid had been in contact with the phone. I am now phoneless and stuck on the contract. Overall was fairly good for music, texting was a bit slow, liked the design. Honestly, i liked the phone until it died, but its not just been me who has had many techinical problems with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 5800
Reviews.Author: Walter Rodríguez A
Reviews.Content: Hi I want to express my experience of my recent purchaseMy phone nokia 5800 does not come with 8 GB memory, which states in itsannouncement that comes with + 8 GB of memory. I think they should be more carefulwith what is published as it is called deception and very upset when oneopen the box and the surprise is that something is missing.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone unlocked about a year ago and still really enjoy it.  I use it for everything now; music, internet, GPS, camera.  And the Nokia Ovi store is getting better applications for the phone.  Some apps do close randomly at times but besides that no major problems. The battery life holds for about 2 days on moderate use and charges fully in 1-2 hours.  Very customizable, especially with the SPB mobile app, well worth the $30 to make your phone look sharper.  Bottom line: This phone is better than the iPhone.  Might not be as pretty but look up the specs and compare.
